suite.name: Calculadora Custom Feature & Calculadora Division Feature & Calculadora Multiplication Feature & Calculadora Subtract Feature & Calculadora Sum Feature

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Open App
kw.doc: switch between local and Browserstack testsetup

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Import Variables
kw.doc: Imports a variable file with the given path and optional arguments.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |
